pageContext.claim: “Thousands of illegal aliens who have committed sexual crimes against children are right now in Texas prisons. Most came through our Southern Border. We can end this easily - We need a Steel Barrier or Wall. Walls Work! John Jones, Texas Department of Public Safety.  @FoxNews”
pageContext.analysis: Trump often parrots false or misleading information from Fox News, and this is an example. There were 2,837 undocumented immigrants convicted in Texas for all sexual offenses against adults and minors from 2011 to 2018, according to state data.
